posts.message:
A designer or UI developer who use Dreamweaver and Photoshop to design. They deliver HTML that looks like this:

Hello, Alan

Then I add my AngularJs templates, like this:

Hello, {{username}}

Now if they need to fix something in the HTML layout, they have to run a fully fledged server with Angular, backed by DB, etc. Just to be able to test it with normal looking data. Question: Is there a way for a designer to deal with HTML templates without having to run a server?

posts.message:
#Paypal #Question
I wanna accept online payments in USD through PayPal Payments Standard, I have paypal account but connect to an Egyptian credite card and verified, n have another USD account in HSBC, How does it work? should i connect my paypal account with USD bank account to be able to withdraw dollars, or how i even withdraw recieved money from paypal? 
I hope i don't sound dumb* :D
Any mobile app developer started working on Dollars exchange rate aggregation App from different Egyptian banks ? ..
Are we going to see some #codevember action here?
